subject: [junit] Timeout exception location
msgSnippet: Hi, How can I know in tests that finish with timeout what is the location in code (StackTrace) that been execute when the timeout finish ? I can override
messageBody:
Hi,

How can I know in tests that finish with timeout what is the location in
code (StackTrace) that been execute when the timeout finish ?

I can override FailOnTimeout if that necessary.

Thanks
